Row.Text: Let all listen, and be willing to listen to the teachings of all others.
I am Ashoka, the great king at the center of the world, and profound sinner.
I am Ashoka, the great king at the center of the world, and profound sinner.
I am Ashoka, the great king at the center of the world, and profound sinner.
The path of violence is a path that I swore never to take again. But here we are.
Violence echoes across multiple lives, multiple worlds. It will return to you.
And now, the burning wheel passes over me.
